homepage.subtitle.message: Welcome to the EC Designer – A powerful tool within EzyDesigner SaaS that empowers businesses to create, customize, and sell personalized products effortlessly.

homepage.getStarted.description.message: Learn the fundamentals and key concepts of EC Designer to get started quickly.

homepage.photobookDesigner.description.message: Turn memories into masterpieces. Create and customize photobooks with intuitive tools and ready-to-use layouts.

homepage.printDesigner.description.message: Elevate your print offerings. Design, configure, and launch premium print products for your customers with ease.

homepage.calendarDesigner.description.message: Bring every day to life. Craft personalized calendars with stunning designs and flexible customization options.

homepage.customProductDesigner.descripti.message: From gifts to home décor, design unique custom products that resonate with your customers

homepage.dtfProductDesigner.description.message: Simplify apparel creation. Set up Direct-to-Film printing for t-shirts, hoodies, and more in just a few clicks.
